definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: Til boredom overtook us, and he began to speak.
sentences.chinese: 百無聊賴中，賭鬼他對我開了腔。

definition: a form of theatrical double act in which one performer speaks or sings while the other, in front, pretends to be doing the speaking or singing/double reed (as in an oboe or bassoon)
smile spread across the face (idiom); beaming with pleasure/all smiles/joy written across one's face
lit. without wind there cannot be waves (idiom); there must be a reason/no smoke without fire
lit. dressed up animal (idiom)/fig. immoral and despicable person
sighing voice, wailing breath (idiom)/to heave deep sighs/to sigh in despair
the empty city stratagem (in which Zhuge Liang presents himself as unperturbed while making it evident that his city is undefended, hoping his adversary will suspect an ambush)/double bluff
to take revenge and wipe out a grudge (idiom)
